category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_open_task2perform
preference.preference_description: Activates the performance transaction for the opening of the Tasks to Perform folder. This measures the elapsed time to expand the folder. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the Tasks to Perform folder expansion performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the Tasks to Perform folder expansion performance transaction.
